creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: child's dress with open sides and cap sleeves; strips of a variety of fabrics joined and applied to a red base fabric; sides bound in purple; geometric patterns formed by metal plaques and shells; two small shell circles at top and one large at bottom; design on both front and back of dress; stamped metal pieces both round and rectangular of various sizes
title: Child's dress
